title: When is camille coming out?
body:
Is camille coming in the next patch? And if yes, when is the next patch coming?


Thx for support and help.

replies.body: You know, I'm not really sure when she's coming out. Unfortunately, I'm not told *absolutely everything*, but we can both keep an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) together when the official announcement is made. ^.^
